text: Probably all humans know, I'm not sure if it's bigger than Sergeant Colon, sent a signal.

passages.full_quote: <used>Probably all humans know, I'm</used> probably very silly for asking, it's probably a well-known fact.
And, you <used>know, I'm not sure</used> about that myself

passages.fragment: I 'm not sure if it 's bigger than Sergeant Colon ,
passages.full_quote: "<used>I'm not sure if it's bigger than Sergeant Colon, t</used>hough."

passages.fragment: than Sergeant Colon , sent a signal
passages.full_quote: After a minute or two one of them happened to glance at the Watch House tower, nudged his colleague, produced two bats of his own and with, rather less élan <used>than Sergeant Colon, sent a signal</used>
